website_summaries.verdict: Designed as a complement to the ScoopFree automatic litter box, this mat is designed to remove the larger crystals used in ScoopFree litter. It also works well with other litter box types.
pros: Very durable, especially for the price
Rubberized material will not absorb odors
cons: Very small, only useful for first steps
Litter crystals may remain on paws, not captured by mat

customer_reviews.title: My cats like to pee on this
customer_reviews.text: So much for trying to have a mat for them to wipe their feet. They just pee on this mat instead of going in the litter box now. Cleaning it, doesn't clean well, if it has cat pee on it. The smell doesn't come out. Also, the litter kind of sticks to the mat itself when you're trying to wash it. I feel like I wasted my money with this product, as I don't want my house smelling like cat pee... and even after washing it... and bringing it back in... still smells like cat pee and they just pee on it again.
customer_reviews.author: CrabbShack

customer_reviews.title: Catches Litter Well
customer_reviews.text: I was originally concerned because it doesn't seem to round off from the photo, but it fits with the letterbox very well. We had the box without a lid or mat for a while and often had to sweep. Ever since getting both, we haven't had issues with litter being everywhere. This may very much captures the littler the cats bring out, and I'm definitely glad we got it. It's far easier to pick it up and swish it in the trash than it is to sweep every day (which honestly defeats the purpose of a self cleaning letterbox a bit, huh?)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Litter Mat
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go with my kitty litter box. It works well. It is not as easy to clean as they state but it is not too hard. It does the job of keeping the kitty litter on the mat and not all over. Of course, some kitty litter gets on the floor but that is due to the cat not the mat. I don't think it is soft for the feet, but then it has to be of quality to get the kitty litter off the cat's feet. I like it all in all
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Large Mat
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the petsafe self-cleaning litter box, I want it to get a new mat to put in front of it since the old one was dirty. I like this mat because the color exactly matches the litter box and I am also pleasantly surprised at how well it captures stray litter when my cat jumps out of the litter box. Its nice and large and so far has not left any residue or color stains on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amcooper2006

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty unnecessary. I bought this to go with my self scooping litter box of the same brand. That self scooping litter seems to get everywhere, so I thought that this would help. It catches a little, but for the most part, it’s the same big mess. I guess the quality is good and it does match the litter box, but as far as functionality I give it a D.
customer_reviews.author: David Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is great. For two cats, this grabs the litter right off of their feet when they hop out of the box. I felt it could be a little longer and wider by an inch or two, but it matches our electric litter box and needs pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Giudici

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I am pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The mat collects the litter quite well. I have a cat that decided to use the mat to pee on. I know the mat is not purposed for this, however in the area where the lettering is, the material is quite thin and it allows liquids to leak to the floor. This is why it didn't get a 5. Otherwise I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hold your nose
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cushy, traps litter well. Unfortunately, it also traps the odor of accidents. I rinsed it off with the hose but that wasn’t enough. I scrubbed it with nice smelling shampoo; not enough. Now I’m trying soaking it in white vinegar. I’ll add a follow-up. If your cats never have accidents, I totally recommend this litter mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves me hours of cleaning time monthly
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for my cat. i own a Maine Coon and the hobbit-like fur that grows over his foot pads means that he used to track litter all over the house. This mat catches a large percentage! I have hosed it off to remove fur and dust but be sure to shake all the clay litter out of it before getting it wet--
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tombrello

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean, cats thought it was useable...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get the crystals out of this thing...it did survive the clothes washer though. Not sure what it was, but my cats hated this mat. They kept using it as part of the litter box...hence I tried cleaning it thoroughly, thinking they could smell the crystals and maybe thought it was an ok place to go. I've had other mats and the cats didn't do this, so very weird. Finally threw it away because it actually created more of a mess for me in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for the ScoopFree litter boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by how durable this mat is. I've purchased other mats and have been disappointed with how fast they fall apart or get messed up by the cats. This one is large enough that it's difficult for the cat to jump over it, yet it's gentle on their paws so they don't feel the need to jump over it. The color purple matches the ScoopFree purple litter boxes perfectly. It's a nice color purple. I would suggest this mat. The sellers/shippers got it out quickly and we received it well before the expected delivery date by Amazon. I was very impressed how quickly we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not it's intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I set this mat out on the floor while I set up the litter box. The kitten discovered it and went into attack mode. She bit and clawed, jumped and rolled, attacked and retreated. Simplest cat toy I ever bought. She loves it so it sits in the middle of the floor awaiting her next ambush. I should be so easily amused.
customer_reviews.author: Southern VetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat along with the PetSafe ScoopFree Ultra Self-Cleaning Litter Box. It works great, looks great, and I have absolutely no tracking of litter throughout the house. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mandelbrot

customer_reviews.title: A Wider litter mat would be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Unnecessary product, It does catched those spilled kitty litter a little bit but i got more kitty litter spilled on the floor around that mat. unfortunately this mat is too small, it could be wider. It does need a strong vacuum to clean up this litter mat. My floor vacuum works better to clean this than my handheld vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Vlinder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and shape
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something wide enough to handle my messy cat while also being stylish. This fit the bill! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: need to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: this litter mat is okay but to work better it needs to be a bit bigger. My cat jumps out of the litter box and probably only takes two or rhre steps before she's off it. She still has litter on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: LCFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, traps litter bits that cling to cat's feet on their way out of the litter box. Helps keep floor around the litter box location cleaner. Nice color. I'm satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lala Seattle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING!! I have not been able to find anything comparable to the scoopfree anti-tracking mat. It literally banishes the little pebbles around my cat boxes. I keep one close to each cat box. After having them for 3 months - i have found that it makes a huge noticeable difference on the amount of crystals that get all over the house. Don't bother buying the cheap mats. This one is 1/2 the size and works SO MUCH BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Kissa

customer_reviews.title: Great item great price
customer_reviews.text: This Matt does a part of the job so send me of the litter stays on it when my kitten steps out it prevents some of the crystals I use . The price is excellent fast shipping . I recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best automatic cat box EVER
customer_reviews.text: WOW this is the BEST litter box ever bought it a week ago still no smell and I have 2 cats. I've been buying littermaids since they came out and as you all know they get stuck all the time and need extensive cleaning This box is quiet and there is absolutely no smell or getting stuck I bought the plastic litter liner as I have read that the factory cardboard ones leak SO far beyond ecstatic about this purchase. Yes the litter is more expensive but we'll worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Infinitiboi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Stopping Litter from Getting Scattered
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with the ScoopFree Litter Box. It would work well with enter/exit side of any litter box. Good size. Very easy to clean. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: Pee instead of litter on floor
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and keeps litter in one spot. however cats are peeing on it. it's the only place they pee except the box. it is not easy to get cat pee out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Rose

customer_reviews.title: this one works much better and is easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: Between this and the other mat I've used, this one works much better and is easier to clean. The other mat was the black one that you pour out the litter from the center that separates. It was so messy! This one really holds onto the litter. and keeps it from spreading around.
customer_reviews.author: p a hartley jr

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove litter from the mat
customer_reviews.text: It's nearly impossible to remove the litter "crystals" from this mat. Eventually, enough gathered in it that the cat decided it was as good as a new litterbox... and used it as such.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Good Cat Litter Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat to use under your litter box. It traps all the litter and doesn't fade, it has kept up and is quite durable
customer_reviews.author: Nikk Budlong

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kitties
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a mat for people’s feet. It’s VERY comfortable to step on, it stays in place, is not slippery, stays dry, doesn’t mold, and is easy to clean by shaking it out or spraying with water. Bonus- can use this as Miners Moss as well.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy and nice mat, really tracks the cat litter off my cats feet. And it is very strong . worth the money
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly having to fix this mat and put it back into place. The cats barely jump on it and it moves around.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's okay but I've seen better
customer_reviews.text: This rug is okay. It catches some of the crystal litter but not all of it. It's also a pain to vacuum. They're are definitely better mats out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee T.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kitty litter off of the floor and keeps me from having to clean it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the mess from the litter in the mat and not on the floor. Then I just roll the mat up and put the excess back into the self cleaning litter box. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: ashley charidy

customer_reviews.title: Great companion to the litter box
customer_reviews.text: Nice rubber litter tracking Matt. I wasnt sure my cat would like this at first but he doesn't mind it at all. Even though he doesn't track many of the crystals out of the box it still happens and the matt catches quite a few of them. The coolest thing is that I can run the vacuum right over it with out it getting all caught up in there. It's very soft to touch. Easy clean up is always the key with making me happy. The size is larger than I expected, but just right, not too big.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Traps the litter nicely and matches the litter box lid, minus 1/2 star because it doesn't match the shape of the front of the box (which is curved). Also this was the best price I found after searching a couple pet sites. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but it doesn’t really work
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great quality material but it doesn’t really keep the crystals off the cat or from spreading all over the floor
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wish they'd have included this with the litter box! Before this, my cats would jump out and track litter everywhere. I've had this for 3 days now, and I haven't seen a single trace of litter anywhere. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cavnar

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use 409 on it. The chemicals react with what ever it is coated with and it ends up smelling like someone who is very dehydrated pissed all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning holds well.
customer_reviews.text: I will need to be one more in time for the second litter box. Works great at holding litter and all I do is shake it for a bit and it cleans right out.
customer_reviews.author: mikayla liley

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: DONT HAVE TO CHASE LITTER DOWN EVERYWHERE NOW... THIS WORKS GREAT!! EASY TO CLEAN TOO
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Craige

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, matches the ScoopFree litter box color.
customer_reviews.text: This mat does a good job of catching most bits of litter that our cats track out of the litter box. It also matches the color of the ScoopFree automatic litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Traps litter very well, my cat is crazy messy so this has been a huge help. Little tough to clean it out because of all the books and crannies but overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: AZM

customer_reviews.title: Best System out there
customer_reviews.text: Goes great with my auto kitty box. This is the BEST litter system, cannot day enough great things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Traps crystals fairly well.
customer_reviews.text: Slips on tile floor, which is a big negative for me. It traps the litter fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful - weave too small for litter, and cats pee on it incessantly
customer_reviews.text: Not a good mat, and I replied too late to receive a refund, as I had to go out of town for 3 weeks and returned to a litter-pee coated mat. The mat weave is too small for the ScoopFree litter to fall in, so it is like having a carpet there. Additionally (the worst part) there was something on it that made my cats pee on it incessantly. Even after washing it. They have never done that with any mat before. So I threw away the pretty purple mat ... and kept the Smiling Paws BPA-Free Urine-Proof Cat Litter Mat, Extra Large, Ruby Beige mat, which I had purchased previously for another area. The Smiling Paws mat is excellent:
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! An anti-tracking mat that actually DOES WHAT IT'S SUPPOSED TO! Plus it's purple. Perfect. My cat and I are both quite content with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The cats try to sharpen their claws so litter gets everywhere. Not really the purpose of it.
customer_reviews.author: atasteofcreole

customer_reviews.title: Good to have!
customer_reviews.text: It sure helps knock off cat litter of my kitties feet instead of tracking it all over. Not 100% but much better than not having it there. I wish I had found it sooner. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CBK

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough
customer_reviews.text: Although the concept and materials are good. I found that the mat is not large enough. When my cats ( I have 3) come out of the litter box and walk on the mat, the fiber and texture of the mat does cause some of the litter from their paws to shake loose onto the mat, but since it's not wide or long enough litter still ends up on the floor. Needless to say I'm still searching for the right size...and sweeping up the trail of litter.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B

customer_reviews.title: Works great but....
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great! The one thing I will point out is that if you don't clean the litter of regularly it will start tracking beyond the may again. Also, I found out the hard way that if what gets spilled on the mat, it will become water logged and takes quite a while to completely dry.... and in the mean time the litter tracks beyond the mat. Otherwise it has been great!
customer_reviews.author: BHP

customer_reviews.title: MEDIOCRE AT BEST
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do a very good job of containing the litter. The pearls are difficult to clean up because the literally stick to the rug and the cats still get it stuck to their feet and carry it all over the place. Even though I vacume the rug, it's impossible to get all of the litter pearls up, shaking it doesn't do any better. I would not recommend this product, I'm still searching for a better litter mat.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Kunin

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough to support the cat leaving the litter box. Too short to catch the litter off the paws.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Works much better at catching litter as my cat hops out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works much better at catching litter as my cat hops out of the box. The only complaint is some times it's hard to get the litter out of the mesh, other than that, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Litter in Throw-Away Trays Too Expensive But ScoopFree is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great litter but much too expensive. Buy the identical litter for half the price at Walmart under the name Mimi. Love my ScoopFree. Bought the third-party permanent plastic tray. The only thing I hate about ScoopFree is their wanting you to buy their suoer-expensive throw away cardboard trays filled with litter. Bad news, however the ScoopFree itself is terrific! I'm into my 3rd one in many years!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua F. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it.
customer_reviews.text: It tracks the litter quite well.I have to vacuum it weekly. He has no issues stepping on it. In fact, I think he knows it cleans his paws so he purposefully steps on it after using the litter.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Really saves and catches the crystals that cling to pets ...
customer_reviews.text: Really saves and catches the crystals that cling to pets feet. We did cut the forward edge to match the curve of the forward edge of the scoop free product housing.
customer_reviews.author: Pete’s lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It does help keep the crystals off the carpets & laminate floors as longvas you keep up with it
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Keeps The Litter Area Clean
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a companion to our scoop free self-cleaning litter box. It works well in trapping the crystals from the kitty litter. We find that 99% of our two cats' litter crystals end up on this carpet - which makes for easy cleaning around the litter box. If you are looking for an easy cleaning and less mess around the litter box than I highly recommend this carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. David P. Craig

customer_reviews.title: I three it out. It smelled so bad.
customer_reviews.text: This traps odors after a month it is totally disgusting. It soes not clean at all. I did not even bother to return it. The mat had the worst smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: No more stepping on kitty crystals
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I would change is for it to be bigger, everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mat for about a year and it was ok. It got really dirty and wasn’t always easy to clean. I wish it was bigger because my cat still tracked litter outside on to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: MA890

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, is a reasonable size and a reasonable price! The rubber loop texture of it definitely catches most of the litter from my cats' paws; some still gets tracked on the floor, but much less than before. I also love the vibrant purple color. Also, the cats don't seem to mind it; they haven't liked scratchy textured mats I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty L.

customer_reviews.title: Matches the litter box. Other than that, it's mediocre
customer_reviews.text: This catches some of the litter but it is still tracked all over my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I absolutely love this!! It's just as described and it sure makes life easier not having to scoop. Product is super easy to set up, my two cats took to it right away. The auto sensors keep track of when they use the box, it stays clean and no odors. The unit is easy to maintain and change the refills. I highly recommend this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't prevent tracking at all, just adds to the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Al0

customer_reviews.title: Twice as big would be perfect if you have the space for it
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a bit larger, we still get litter off the mat. Twice as big would be perfect if you have the space for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rodman

customer_reviews.title: 2 cats, vinyl plank
customer_reviews.text: 2 cats. Wall to wall vinyl plank. This mat is your new bff. Did great controlling the chaos
customer_reviews.author: R. Magyar

customer_reviews.title: Traps most of the litter
customer_reviews.text: It tracks most of the litter but I still end up with quite a bit outside the mat. Maybe my cat is just messy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but lacking a little
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, wish it was a little larger, litter seems to kind of sit on top of the may, rather than being trapped inside of it though.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Second time around
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the same mat after the first one was in use for nearly 6 years and no matter the amount of cleaning or trying to disinfect the original purchase, I could not eliminate the odor from it. I was told plastic holds on to odors so I just purchased a new one and am very happy to throw the old one away. The mat does a good job of retaining the few crystals that are transferred out of the litter box and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best litter box and mat made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best litter box and mat made. There is very little mess but this catches it and I shake it into the tray when it goes to trash. Voila
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great price and last
customer_reviews.text: Catches all the litter they kick out and so easy to clean I love it
customer_reviews.author: Bri Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Yes good mat
customer_reviews.text: Really great mat, cats had to get used to it they adjusted within a few days to the texture. It does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Willis

customer_reviews.title: Does a decent job. I think my cats are ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job. I think my cats are messy tho, because they consistently get litter flung further than the size of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bednarski

customer_reviews.title: This mat did catch the crystals but then I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat did catch the crystals but then I couldn't get them out. I tried my Dyson vacuum, shaking it out, running under a hose, etc. Eventually my cats started peeing on the mat because of the crystal buildup on the mat. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: LetY

customer_reviews.title: but rather that my cat did not like his new automated litter box and decided to go ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 3 stars not because the product does not stop the tracking of litter, but rather that my cat did not like his new automated litter box and decided to go on this. I washed it, bleached it and put it back and she used it as her bathroom again. So, I had to throw it away. Having said all that, it did trap litter as it was supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Litter mat
customer_reviews.text: Works great at collecting the litter when the cat climbs out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Collects litter quite well. I do wish it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not Purple
customer_reviews.text: The color of poop -- definitely not purple. Works okay. Not quite as large as I had hoped. I should have measured before I placed my order.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this seems to trap the litter better than other mats I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Lainimac

customer_reviews.title: Keeps floor clean
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I was expecting but overall nice product. Traps litter and keeps it from tracking onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: scr1991

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My cats litter was everywhere within 6 feet of the litter box. With this mat, it is very few grains of litter thatgo beyond this mat. So much easier for me when vacuuming! I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Madigan

customer_reviews.title: I loved the mat and the color that matched the self ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mat and the color that matched the self cleaning litter box unfortunately one of my cats insisted on using it instead of the litter box and she finally tore a hole in it and I had to throw it away, but if you don't have a nutty cat it works beautiful and is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F. Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good mat, wish manufacturer would stop punching holes in it for the packaging. Those pinholes make it not urine proof. Otherwise a nice thick mat.
customer_reviews.author: paigetime

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work so well
customer_reviews.text: Using blue crystal litter for the first time I thought this would be useful. However, the blue crystals still tracked across the room. I put down an old towel instead and got better results. Maybe the larger towel has more territory that the cat has to walk over before making it to the tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Knowles

customer_reviews.title: A fairly good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good purchase. Our cat keeps kicking the paper litter out of the box, so this was nice to have to catch those pieces. Only wish their logo wasn't indented because sometimes the smaller pieces fall in those cracks and it's a bit of a hassle to get them out. But still, worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: General Zod

customer_reviews.title: Best for crystal litter
customer_reviews.text: Definitely better than other litter mats for crystal litter. I wish it was much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: MRG

customer_reviews.title: ScoopFree Must Have
customer_reviews.text: If you own a ScoopFree litterbox, you need this mat. Saved my feet from many a litter-crystal impaling.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It captures some of the crystals
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure yet if an ordinary rug would have done the same. It's sort of hard to vacuum the crystals off this carpet. The concept of capturing crystals on the carpet is there... it does the job. I feel a wider one would have been more practical and efficient. Perhaps buying two and placing them side by side would help. Cats don't always step directly in front when exiting.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It gets all of the litter out ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It gets all of the litter out of my cat's paws so they are no longer tracking ti through the whole house!
customer_reviews.author: Rafiki

customer_reviews.title: Less cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Works good but the litter sticks to it, and it’s hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Litter is hard to get off when cleaning but other than that it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as to whether this would make a difference in the amount of crystals tracked out of the litter box, but pleasantly surprised to see a noticeable reduction in the amount of litter on the floors since I started using the mat. I recommend this product, it really does help, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B. Ratisher

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this. It didn't really keep the litter from being tracked everywhere, and it also made my cats start relieving themselves on the mat as well as the litter box. I ended up just throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this mat
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this mat. It does exactly what it is supposed to do. I do not have to sweep litter from my floor. I just sweep the mat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn  R

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Works, but my cat scatters litter passed mat, needs to be larger.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina V

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful "catcher" for inside the doggy door
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful "catcher" for inside the doggy door. No more gravel on my laminate flooring or on my bed. Even with the rain storms, no mud puppy feet or moisture. It is a perfect size even for my 65 lb dog and , unlike mats in the past, he doesn't feel the need to drag it out the door. This is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: karma magers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean. Cat urine smell does not come out easy.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I got tired of feeling/listening to cat litter crunch beneath my shoes. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Allareone

customer_reviews.title: Limits tracking of crystals
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our ScoopFree litter box. The mat works as hoped, to reduce tracking of crystals as our cat exits the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great at the loose litter around the litter box. A lot bigger then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: It Helps
customer_reviews.text: It’s not perfect, but it does help minimize the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle GE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really trap the litter and it’s waterproof too. It’s well made.
customer_reviews.author: M

product_meta.title: PetSafe Cat Litter Mat - ScoopFree Box Compatible - Mesh
product_meta.description:
Size:Small| Color:PurpleThe anti-tracking carpet, especially designed to match your ScoopFree litter box, is made of durable soft and spongy material. It's stylish for you and comfortable for your cat. The carpet eliminates most litter tracking, especially when used with the privacy hood.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: LESS MESS: The spongy mat traps litter and reduces tracking around your home; perfect for high-traffic areas and multi-cat homes
COMFORT FOR YOUR CAT: Spongy material is soft and comfortable for your cat’s paws
COMPATIBLE LITTER BOXES: Works with any cat litter box
PRODUCT SUPPORT: PetSafe brand's U.S.-based Customer Care experts will be glad to help; call Monday through Saturday at 1-800-845-3274
EXPERIENCE: PetSafe brand has been an industry leading U.S. manufacturer of pet behavior, containment and lifestyle products since 1991, helping millions of people and pets each year
